snippet: The storm shut down government offices on Monday and Tuesday, threatening to delay the release of the monthly jobs numbers.
abstract: Labor Department says October jobs report will be released as scheduled, despite interference from Hurricane Sandy; report is most anticipated piece of economic data still to be released before presidential election.
lead_paragraph: The storm shut down government offices on Monday and Tuesday, threatening to delay the release of the monthly jobs numbers.

headline.seo: U.S. Labor Report on Jobs to Arrive Friday on Schedule
headline.main: Labor Dept. Report on Jobs to Appear Friday as Planned
headline.print_headline: Labor Dept. Report on Jobs To Appear Friday as Planned
